name: Decima
description: Decima (DCMA) is a premium digital currency issued by Decima Technologies Private Limited and backed by Banco de Seychelles with asset backing of 3 Trillion USD and corpus liquidity of 100 Trillion USD. With a total supply of 21 million and a fixed value of $110,000 per coin, Decima is positioned as a high-value, reserve-grade cryptocurrency for sovereign-grade tokenization and private digital assets.
